data.actual_result: When click Mutual Friends tab, the list loads slow, but will immediately loaded when click other tab and click back
data.expected_result: When click Mutual Friends tab, the list should immediately show up
data.short_description: Mutual Friends tab loads slower then switch to other tab and immediately switch back
data.steps_to_repro: - Close Discord App - Click any of your friend that have mutual friends - Click Mutual Friends tab, you will notice that loading is slow - Close Discord App again - Click same friend you have chosen in step 2 - Click Mutual Friends tab, but immediately click on other tab and click back to Mutual Friends tab - The list will be immediately show up
